title: Need advice
content: So I have a rank of 17** and category 1 reservation which gets me PES CS in the first round and I might get RV ISE in the second extended round. From what I've seen placements for these two are very similar and PES definitely has the better campus. So what do I choose?

comments.body:
Similar situation buddy,
What'd you decide?
I'm really into sports so the facilities at PES are really tipping the scale but I'm also having to decide between friends so....
Friends should not affect your decision. You should choose what benefits your career the most. If you are into sports, your friends cannot play the game for you lol.

Yeah I agree. But when there's no clear winner (atleast to me) these factors should also be considered. RV does have a smaller batch size but PES is still on even footing with it in terms of placements (for the options that are available to me) and I definitely prefer the PES campus which again isn't a factor for most people but it is to me. Now I don't know if others opinions really help but after fucking everything up, I atleast wanna make the right decision here.
Also I really appreciate the input
Unrelated but someone on insta called me a PESticide.Â
